controls.name: reflectanceSettingsFile
controls.caption: Reflectance settings file
controls.description: Existing JSON file with reflectance settings.

controls.name: maximalPrecision
controls.caption: Maximal precision
controls.description: If set, this function works with maximal possible accuracy. In particular, for 8-bit matrices, if works directly with "a255" coefficient in the settings file (when it is specified).
